subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: The Japanese star who fell a neck short last year when he looked certain to win the Arc in the stretch, is back this year, carrying his nation’s hopes to capture the elusive prize it so craves.
snippet: The Japanese star who fell a neck short last year when he looked certain to win the Arc in the stretch, is back this year, carrying his nation’s hopes to capture the elusive prize it so craves.
